title: Kubernetes multi-cluster application and data management made simple
description: CAPE accelerates scaling Kubernetes in production and closes skill gaps by providing advanced Kubernetes functionality for Disaster Recovery, Data Migration & Mobility, Multi-cluster Application Deployment and CI/CD within a single, intuitive interface. CAPE supports all major public cloud platforms, on-premise and edge environments.

courses.title: Introduction to CAPE Features
courses.description: This tutorial will walk you through how to: install CAPE using Helm, set up a Kubernetes cluster for backup, create an on-demand backup, and restore a backup
